summary: This CSS file introduces styles for various elements in the user interface of the software system. It defines the layout, alignment, and appearance of elements such as titles, buttons, navigation elements, logos, menus, genres, posters, and text content. The file includes code for responsive design, hover effects, and transitions to enhance user interaction. Additionally, it introduces styles for different sections like the navigation bar, genre buttons, logo animations, menu icons, and poster display. These styles contribute to the overall visual representation and user experience of the software system.
